example.text: Over 100,000 Americans die prematurely every year because of air pollution. [[user]] is taking action to limit some of the most dangerous pollutants and protect clean air. Now Republicans want to abandon that progress, once again putting #PollutersOverPeople. I'm voting NO. [[url]]

Led a letter with Rep. [[user]] and Senator [[user]] urging bakers to stop unnecessarily adding sesame to baked goods & protect consumers with sesame allergies. These actions undercut the purpose & intent of my bill, the FASTER Act, which [[user]] signed into law in 2021. [[url]]

Announced a new [[user]] Regional Food Business Center in the Sacramento region alongside Under Secretary Jennifer Moffitt! Through a partnership with [[user]], community organizations, farmers, and innovators, this Center will focus on equity and serving underserved communities. [[url]]

By establishing a National Biodiversity Strategy, the US can become a leader in conservation and guide international efforts. It's time for us to strengthen our commitment to safeguarding the diversity of living things in our country and around the world. #BiodiversityDay [[url]]
